segments.text: I wonder if it is possible that we organize a dinner party for all the colleagues in our departments . They are working very hard these days . Maybe it is time for everybody to relax a little .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a good idea , I love it . What time do you think is convenient ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what about this Thursday evening after we finish the weekly meeting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I will inform everybody when they come back from lunch . It has been a long time since we had the department dinner last time . I am sure they don â€™ t want to miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so . Let me know how many will come . Then I will book the restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1
